text: Physical health   Mental health  I m sorry  but mental health is downright difficult to treat  Personality disorders are awful  The behavior and thoughts don t change  I will have to spend my whole life fighting my natural personality because of how destructive it is  It s like fighting an addiction  but the addiction is my thoughts and behavior  Personality disorders are awful awful awful  The depression and anxiety is second to the personality disorders  It s probably as impairing as autism  bipolar  and schizophrenia  I feel you sufferers out there  And paying for treatment is downright stupid  It feels just like those addiction clinics  It s an insurance game  They don t care to do their job well  I d rather pay to read a book from a world renowned leader in the field then go to a therapist who doesn t try to help  These therapist are expert BSers  And I am making mine sue me to get any fucking money from me  If you aren t going to try to help me  you aren t getting any money from me  I hope the US recognizes why the suicide rate  keeps climbing in America  and it s because of how terrible the mental health treatment is and the fact that we have to go into large sums of debt to get bad medical treatment
